Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. This product holds significant value to you, worth $12000. To make it accessible and considering its high quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
